name: Quest Of Legend Demo
description: hi this a demo for a WIP game this is a version that is near completion this demo will always stay up if anyone wants to see what the game is but the full game will be put up for a price of £1. this is my 2nd game that ive made with a serious intent and 3rd in general im a 14 year old developer thats been making games for a little over a year now and since im still new to the scene any criticism would be a big help thank you :)
